comments:
Occasionally, when I startup Eclipse on my Gentoo Linux box, I get an
ExceptionInInitializerError thown to the console.  Eclipse still starts up and
appears to function normally.  If I exit and reopen Eclipse, the exception is
not thrown.

Sadly, I do not.  Back when I reported the bug, it was happening a couple times
a week.  Then it stopped, and I haven't seen the error in a few months.  I am
unable to reproduce it, so unless the stack trace is enough to figure out what
was going wrong, there probably isn't much we can do.
Are you still using the same build?
